title: PHPUnit depends on packages that broke backwards compatability
body:
Instead of a coverage report I get a series of Notices:

Notice: Object of class PHPUnit_TextUI_ResultPrinter could not be converted to double in /home/travis/build/joshribakoff/php-csv-utils/vendor/phpunit/php-code-coverage/PHP/CodeCoverage/Report/Text.php on line 259

You can observe this on my build here, which simply require's PHPUnit via composer, and runs some tests. This seems like a bug with PHPUnit or its dependencies, or some interaction therein. You can see the version of everything in the travis CI output but I've copied it below also.

https://travis-ci.org/joshribakoff/php-csv-utils/jobs/7413779
- Installing phpunit/php-text-template (dev-master 1eeef10)
  Cloning 1eeef106193d2f8c539728e566bb4793071a9e18
  - Installing phpunit/php-token-stream (dev-master c25dd88)
    Cloning c25dd88e1592e66dee2553c99ef244203d5a1b98
  - Installing phpunit/php-file-iterator (dev-master 2deb24c)
    Cloning 2deb24c65ea78e126daa8d45b2089ddc29ec1d26
  - Installing phpunit/php-code-coverage (1.2.x-dev ac44d7c)
    Cloning ac44d7cab145515d1496f84811e42a5c5f39ee74
  - Installing phpunit/phpunit-mock-objects (1.2.x-dev 8e9d897)
    Cloning 8e9d897b39ca6310ccc2d81b8f29cabd5ce12786
  - Installing symfony/yaml (2.2.x-dev 2412f99)
    Cloning 2412f9950036ade5e89581e648edbe04e8fe2681
  - Installing phpunit/php-timer (1.0.x-dev ecf7920)
    Cloning ecf7920b27003a9412b07dad79dbb5ad1249e6c3
  - Installing phpunit/php-invoker (1.1.x-dev a5b015d)
    Cloning a5b015da8d3d95912ab606dca70fcb7314b48895
  - Installing phpunit/phpunit (3.7.19)
    Downloading: connection...    Downloading: 65%    Downloading: 100%
  - Installing phpunit/phpunit-selenium (dev-master 26541aa)
    Cloning 26541aa6f27c7dc163b534180992d27abefd95d6
  - Installing phpunit/phpunit-story (dev-master 1.0.2)
    Cloning 1.0.2
  - Installing phpunit/dbunit (1.2.x-dev 1.2.3)
    Cloning 1.2.3
